abstract: Three years after the financial crisis, Merrill Lynch is thriving, despite fears it would drag Bank of America down. But other troubles at the bank are overshadowing Merrill's turnaround.
snippet: Three years after the financial crisis, Merrill Lynch is thriving, despite fears it would drag Bank of America down. But other troubles at the bank are overshadowing Merrill's turnaround.

headline.main: No Longer a Drag, but No Joy at Merrill
